text: Group C of the 2014 FIFA World Cup consisted of Colombia, Greece, Ivory Coast, and Japan. Play began on 14 June and ended on 24 June 2014. ==Standings== *Colombia advanced to play Uruguay (runner-up of Group D) in the round of 16. *Greece advanced to play Costa Rica (winner of Group D) in
